info.name: Downloads Button Fat Progress Bar for Firefox 54
info.description:
Restore downloads button progress bar on Firefox 54. Enlarge the bar and the countdown font. Tested on Windows with the default theme. NOT FOR FIREFOX 55+!

2017-06-21 - updated for Firefox 54
2016-08-28 - only widen the button during a download
info.additionalInfo:
The rules related to the toolbar button do not work in Firefox 55 or later: the button will appear blank while a download is in progress. Please uninstall or disable this style!

Sorry, the important bits were removed from Firefox and can't be reinstated by a simple style rule.
